tags.name: testTag
tags.description: I'm using this to test a tag.

tags.name: testTag2
tags.description: It's a second tag, for testing.

tags.name: Highlights_Normal
tags.description: When aiming down sights, this weapon outlines targets in a red glow.

tags.name: Highlights_Outliers_Scopes
tags.description: If in-game Scope description includes "Highlights targets", aiming down sights will outline targets in a red glow.

tags.name: Highlights_Outliers_Taken
tags.description: Taken enemies will be outlined with a red glow when aiming down sights. Ornaments remove this effect.

tags.name: Highlights_Outliers_Trials
tags.description: When aiming down sights, this weapon will highlight targets in a faint red full body effect. The perk Celerity may amplify this effect to include a red outline.

tags.name: Highlights_Outliers_S19
tags.description: When aiming down sights, this weapon outlines targets in a green glow.

tags.name: Highlights_Outliers_S12
tags.description: After aiming on a target for a short time, this weapon will outline a single target in a red glow.

tags.name: Highlights_Exotics
tags.description: When aiming down sights, this weapon outlines targets with a red glow. Ornaments may remove or alter this effect.

tags.name: Highlights_DARCI
tags.description: When aiming down sights on a single target within 150 meters for a short duration, said target will be outlined in a red glow
